item.description:
This is a link to the event:

http://www.rescueleague.org/2011petstep.cfm

The following information is taken off of the link website and there is more information than this on the website.

Entrance Fee to event: $10 per person or $25 for a family. Consider raising pledges ahead of time in lieu of your entrance fee. Prizes are awarded for individuals raising the most amount of money prior to the event.

Time: Gates open at 9:30am, event runs from 10am until 2:30pm.

What: This is one of the largest fundraisers that the League runs each year. Leashed and vaccinated dogs are welcome, the event is completely outdoors, rain or shine. Enjoy shopping at the 50+ vendors, enjoy snacks, goodies and lunch, games for dogs, a kid's corner, great pet demonstrations and of course- the walk itself.

The walk is approximately two miles and will head along a dirt road out of the 4H Center, into the center of New Boston through the Farmer's Market where walkers will enjoy a complimentary bottle of water and then return back along the same trail into the 4H Center again.


Event Demos and Happenings:

Agility Demo with Puppy Please 10-10:30am
Kids Corner: Face Painting and decorate your own cupcakes - all day!
Microchipping - all day!
Great breakfast and Lunch from Seed to Stalk
Great lunch items from Uno Chicago Grill
Psychics and Animal Communicators - all day!
Do-it-yourself Agility sponsored by Puppy Please 10:30-12 noon
Canine Good Citizen Testing 9:30am-Noon, 1-2pm (for more info or to book an appt. contact Wendy at deafdal@yahoo.com)
Walk at 11am
Merrimack Police Dog Demo; Officer Walters and Gunny 12-12:30pm
New England Disc Dog Club Demo 12:45pm-1:15pm
Silent Auction Closes at 1pm
Raffle Tables Close in Increments: 1pm, 1:15pm, and 1:30pm
Event ends at 2:30pm

Although during the event and Pet Step Walk it is an on leash activity those who meetup with us at 9:45 can do an off leash walk along the rail trial at the back of the fairgrounds to let the dogs run off some energy before doing the on leash walk. We will be back in time to join the walk at 11:00 AM that goes into town and visits the farmers market in the town square before returning back to the fairgrounds.

 

A link to Melodie's fund raising page that you won't have to cut and paste into you brower:

http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/melodiefrazer/melodiefrazersfundraisingpage
item.how_to_find_us: After parking where ever you end up meet at the registration table at 9:45 AM.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: 8th Annual Pet Step - Animal Rescue League of NH Fundraiser
